short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NetSuite Focus helps you focus by hiding the top header section of the NetSuite UI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An invisible button is applied in the top left-hand corner to provide the ability to unhide and re-hide if you need to access the new item, help and user role options.

Or

Press 'CTRL + Space' or 'Command + Space' to unhide and re-hide the top header section.
